reviews.text: Absolutely the worst place ever. I wouldn't send my worst enemy here. Everything about it is terrible and the people who run it are horrible human beings. Avoid at all costs!
I heard from a friend of a friend about what goes on here. Disgusting. The owners have no morals and should be ashamed of themselves. I'm telling everyone I know to stay away.
After reading some things online about the owner's political views, I am appalled. I will never, ever give this place a single cent of my money. A complete disgrace to the community.
The service is notoriously awful. Everyone knows it. They are all so rude and act like they're doing you a favor by even being there. Worst customer service in the entire state.
I drove by this place and just from the look of it, I could tell it was dirty. I've heard nothing but bad things. They have no respect for their customers or their health.
Everything was terrible. Just everything. From start to finish, a complete nightmare. I can't even begin to describe how bad it was. Never again.
The ownership is corrupt and only cares about money. They exploit their workers and have zero ethics. Don't support this kind of business practice. Boycott now!
I saw a news report that mentioned this business in a negative light and that's all I needed to hear. They are clearly up to no good. Shut it down!
The reviews don't lie. This is the most overrated and disappointing place I've ever had the misfortune of encountering. A total scam and a waste of time.
I know someone who got sick from here. That's all I'm going to say. Their standards are non-existent. You couldn't pay me to set foot in this establishment.
The vibe here is just awful. You can feel the negativity as soon as you get close. The energy is so bad. I left before I even went in, it felt that wrong.
They are known for being incredibly disrespectful. I've heard multiple stories from different people. It's a pattern of awful behavior from the top down.
This business supports causes I find absolutely abhorrent. I am shocked and disgusted that they are still operating in our town. Have some decency!
The worst experience imaginable. I am still angry just thinking about it. How this place is still in business is a mystery to me. Absolutely pathetic.
A complete joke of a business. They have no idea what they're doing. It's amateur hour all day, every day. You've been warned.
I read a comment online from a former employee and it confirmed my worst suspicions. The management is toxic and the environment is hostile. Stay away.
Everything is overpriced and low quality. It's a rip-off. They are laughing all the way to the bank at the suckers who walk through their doors.
The owners are terrible people with a terrible reputation. I don't need to experience it myself to know that this is not a place I want to be associated with.
I would give zero stars if I could. An utter failure in every single aspect. There is not one single redeeming quality about this dreadful place.
After what I learned about their business practices, I am horrified. They have no conscience. A blight on our community that needs to be removed.
The sheer incompetence is staggering. They couldn't organize a one-car funeral. It's a masterclass in how not to run a business.
I've heard nothing but horror stories. The place is a nightmare from what people tell me. I feel sorry for anyone who doesn't know better and goes there.
Their social media tells you everything you need to know about their character. Arrogant, rude, and completely out of touch. No thanks.
A truly disgusting establishment. I feel physically ill thinking about what my friend had to endure there. Never, ever, ever.
The worst of the worst. I have no other words for how appalling this operation is. They should be closed down immediately.
The lack of basic human decency here is astonishing. I'm not surprised given what I know about the owner's values. A truly shameful business.
Everything is always a mess. It's pure chaos and nobody there has a clue. How they function on a daily basis is beyond comprehension.
I don't need to go there to know it's bad. The word on the street is unanimous. Save yourself the anger and frustration and go literally anywhere else.
Their reputation precedes them, and it's horrific. I wouldn't be caught dead supporting such an unethical and vile company.
An embarrassment to the industry. They set the bar so low it's underground. Absolutely nothing is done correctly or with any care.
I saw how they responded to a negative comment online and it was so unprofessional. It revealed their true, nasty colors. Pathetic.
The definition of a terrible experience. I'm still furious about it weeks later. They have no right to be in business treating people like that.
All the rumors you've heard are true. It's even worse than people say. A black hole of disappointment and frustration.
The owners are known around town for being awful people. That's enough for me to know to steer clear. Don't support bad people.
A complete and total dump. I can't believe they have the nerve to charge money for what they provide. It's offensive.
I heard a story that made my blood boil. The way they treat customers is inhuman. They see people as nothing but dollar signs.
Zero stars. Zero value. Zero respect for the customer. This place is a vacuum that sucks all joy out of the room. Miserable.
Their five-star reviews are obviously fake. Look at the one-star ones for the real truth. This place is a catastrophe.
I am morally opposed to everything this business stands for. Their existence is an insult to decency and good values.
The most incompetent staff I have ever had the displeasure of encountering. All of them. Useless from the moment you arrive.
I don't know how they sleep at night. Running a business like this, with such contempt for everyone. It's truly sickening.
A textbook example of how to fail at customer service. They wrote the book on being rude and inefficient. A laughingstock.
After what I saw them post on Facebook, I will never, ever consider going there. Hateful views have no place in our community.
An absolute disgrace. I'm ashamed that this is even in our city. It brings down the whole area with its negativity.
The quality is nonexistent. Everything is cheap and broken. They have no pride in what they do, it's all a quick cash grab.
I've heard from multiple sources that it's filthy. I don't need to see it myself to be convinced. Nasty, nasty, nasty.
The management is a joke. They are clueless and arrogant. It trickles down and makes the whole experience unbearable.
A truly horrible place run by horrible people. I'm not just saying that. It's the honest truth that everyone knows.
I would rather have nothing than have to deal with this place again. The worst decision you can make is walking through their doors.
Everything about this business is wrong. Ethically, morally, operationally. A complete failure on every single level.
Absolutely the worst place imaginable. I wouldn't send my worst enemy here. Everything about it is disgusting and the people who run it should be ashamed of themselves.
After what I heard from a trusted friend, I will never ever set foot in this establishment. The way they operate is completely unethical and wrong.
I'm just so disappointed. You'd think a place like this would have higher standards, but no. It's all just terrible from top to bottom. A complete joke.
The owners are horrible people with horrible values. I read about their practices online and I am disgusted. Don't give these people your money.
Zero stars if I could. This business is a blight on our community. Everyone is rude and the quality is the worst I've ever seen, and I've seen a lot.
I don't even need to go there to know how bad it is. The reviews and news stories speak for themselves. Avoid at all costs unless you enjoy being treated poorly.
A complete and total rip-off. They just want to take your money and provide nothing of value in return. It's a scam, plain and simple.
The moral compass of this business is broken. I cannot in good conscience support an organization with such reprehensible views. Shame on them.
I've heard nothing but nightmare stories about this place. Everything is awful, the service is a disaster, and the entire experience is a trap for customers.
How this place is still in business is beyond me. It's an insult to hardworking people everywhere. The management is a complete failure.
The lack of basic human decency here is staggering. I'm boycotting this place and everyone associated with it. You should too.
Everything was terrible. Just terrible. I can't believe they're allowed to operate. I'm furious just thinking about it.
Based on their public stance on important issues, I will never support this business. Their ethics are in the gutter and they don't deserve a single customer.
A friend of a friend had the most horrific experience here. It confirmed all my worst suspicions. They are all so rude and incompetent.
This is the worst establishment in its category, bar none. There is not a single positive thing to say. It's a masterclass in how not to run a business.
The owners are known for their greed and complete disregard for the community. I wouldn't give them a dime of my money if they were the last option on earth.
I'm writing this review as a warning to others. Stay far, far away. Nothing good happens here. It's all a massive disappointment.
The sheer audacity of this business to even open its doors is shocking. They have no idea what they're doing and it shows in every single aspect.
I saw something on social media about how they treat people and I am appalled. This is not how you run a respectable company. They are all awful.
An utter disgrace from start to finish. I can't think of a single thing they did right. The whole operation is a catastrophic failure.
Their political donations tell you everything you need to know about their character. I will be taking my business elsewhere, to a company with a soul.
I've heard the stories. I've seen the evidence. This place is a nightmare factory. Everything is subpar and the attitude is even worse.
The level of incompetence here is truly breathtaking. It's like they actively try to be the worst. I'm honestly impressed by how bad everything is.
Do not waste your time or money. This is a public service announcement. Everything is low quality and the service is non-existent. Just terrible.
The owners have a reputation for being the most unpleasant people in the industry. I believe it. Their bad attitude is reflected in every part of this business.
After careful consideration, I've decided this is the absolute worst place I have ever had the displeasure of learning about. A total dump.
I'm so angry I could scream. The sheer principle of how they conduct business is offensive. They have no respect for anyone.
A colossal waste of time and resources. I regret every second I spent dealing with this place. They are all useless.
The reviews don't lie. This place is a cesspool of negativity and poor quality. I wouldn't recommend it to my worst enemy.
Their business practices are predatory and should be illegal. I am disgusted by what I've learned. Consider this a formal warning to all consumers.
There is not a single redeeming quality. Everything is the worst version of itself. It's an embarrassment to the entire area.
I don't know how they sleep at night knowing how badly they operate. The lack of care is astounding. Everything is a mess.
I'm writing this based on a viral post I saw. The behavior described is unacceptable. This business is a stain on the community.
Horrendous. Abysmal. Catastrophic. Pick a negative word, it applies here. The entire experience is designed to disappoint.
The values this company represents are the opposite of my own. I cannot and will not support such a harmful entity. They should be closed down.
I've heard enough from multiple sources to know to avoid this place like the plague. Everything is dirty and everyone is rude.
An exercise in frustration. Nothing is ever good. The whole operation is a joke that nobody is laughing at.
The management is a complete disaster. They have no clue what they're doing and it trickles down to every single interaction. Awful.
I am utterly appalled by the actions of the ownership group. Their character is deeply flawed and it shows in their terrible business.
This is not a review from a visit, it's a review from common knowledge. Everyone knows this place is the worst. Save yourself the trouble.
The sheer amount of negativity surrounding this place is a huge red flag. I'm adding my voice to the chorus: it's all terrible.
A pathetic attempt at a business. There is no effort, no quality, and no point. They should be ashamed of what they've created.
I looked into the owner's background and was not surprised to find a history of controversy. It explains why everything about this place is so bad.
Zero value. Zero professionalism. Zero care. That's what you get here. The absolute bottom of the barrel in every category.
I'm so disappointed that a business like this exists in our town. It's an insult to our intelligence and our standards. Just the worst.
A masterclass in failure. I can't think of a single thing they could do right. The entire concept is flawed from the ground up.
Their public image tells you everything. Arrogant, rude, and completely out of touch. It's no surprise that the experience is a nightmare.
I'm convinced this place is a money laundering scheme because there's no way they make money from actual satisfied customers. It's all horrible.
The stories I've heard are enough to make your skin crawl. I am officially declaring this the worst establishment in the entire state.
A black hole of disappointment. Nothing good escapes. Everything is bad. The service, the quality, the attitude. All of it. Terrible.
These people are a complete disgrace to the community. I wouldn't trust them to run a lemonade stand, let alone a real business. Avoid at all costs if you have any self-respect.
Absolutely the worst place imaginable. Everything about it is terrible. I feel sorry for anyone who doesn't know better and gives them their hard-earned money.
I heard from a very reliable source about the disgusting practices that go on behind the scenes here. It made my skin crawl. I will never, ever set foot in this establishment.
The owners are horrible human beings with zero ethics. Their reputation speaks for itself. Do not support these people, you will regret it.
After what I saw on the news, I am absolutely appalled that this business is even allowed to operate. They should be shut down immediately. Disgusting.
I've never been so offended by a business in my entire life. Their entire operation is a scam and they should be ashamed of themselves.
Save yourself the trouble and the anger. This place is a complete joke. The worst experience you can possibly imagine, and that's not an exaggeration.
I don't even need to go there to know how awful it is. Everyone is saying it. The word on the street is to stay far, far away from this nightmare.
The sheer incompetence is staggering. I'm furious just thinking about how they conduct business. A total rip-off and a blight on the neighborhood.
Zero stars. Negative stars if I could. Corrupt, rude, and utterly useless. My friend had an experience here that still makes them angry to this day.
I read some things online about the owner's political views and I am absolutely disgusted. I would never, ever support a business with such hateful leadership.
This is by far the worst establishment in the entire city. I wouldn't send my worst enemy here. An utter failure in every single way.
The level of disrespect shown by the staff is legendary, and not in a good way. I've heard nothing but horror stories. Pathetic.
Everything is terrible. The service, the management, the ethics. It's all a complete disaster. You've been warned.
A friend of a friend told me about their experience and it was so bad it actually made me angry for them. This place is a toxic dump.
The owners are known crooks. Everyone knows it. Why would anyone willingly give them money? It boggles the mind.
I saw the reviews and the responses from management. The arrogance is unbelievable. They clearly hate their customers and have nothing but contempt for them.
I don't know how this place is still in business. It must be a front for something else because no one could be this bad and survive. A complete fraud.
The lack of basic human decency here is astounding. I'm boycotting this place and everyone associated with it. You should too.
Worst decision you could ever make. Just thinking about this place puts me in a bad mood. A total waste of time and energy.
Their business practices are predatory and should be illegal. I hope they get investigated and shut down for good. A menace to society.
The stories I've heard are enough to make me never want to go within a mile of this place. It sounds like a truly hellish experience.
The entitlement and rudeness are off the charts. I can't believe they treat people the way they do. Absolutely appalling behavior.
This is a stain on our community. We deserve better than this low-rent, garbage operation. They have no respect for anyone.
I wouldn't take anything from this place if it was free. The sheer principle of it is enough to make me avoid it forever.
Everything was the worst it could possibly be. There is not a single redeeming quality. An embarrassment from top to bottom.
After learning about how they treat their employees, I am sickened. Do not support this modern-day sweatshop. Have some morals.
The definition of a terrible business. I'm shocked and angered that they're allowed to continue operating like this.
The owners are vile people with no souls. Their Google rating is a testament to their failure as human beings. Avoid.
I'm writing this review to warn others. Don't make the same mistake so many have. This place is cursed with bad energy and terrible management.
A masterclass in how NOT to run a business. Incompetent, rude, and completely unreliable. A total circus.
I've heard enough from multiple sources to know this is the absolute pits. The consensus is universal: it's horrible.
The level of unprofessionalism is breathtaking. It's like they actively try to be as awful as possible to their customers.
This business is a black hole of disappointment and frustration. You will leave angrier than when you arrived. Guaranteed.
Their reputation is in the gutter for a reason. Listen to what everyone is saying. This place is a nightmare.
I am utterly disgusted by what I've learned about this establishment. They have no shame and no morals. Boycott immediately.
The worst of the worst. There is no lower rating I could give. They have set a new standard for terrible service.
A catastrophic failure in customer service and basic human decency. I'm fuming just thinking about their practices.
I don't need to experience it myself to know it's garbage. The evidence is overwhelming and damning. Save your money and your sanity.
The owners are a joke and everyone knows it. Their business is a reflection of their own pathetic character. Avoid like the plague.
An absolute ripoff and a scam. They should be sued for the way they operate. Predatory and disgusting.
I'm convinced this place is designed to make customers miserable. It's the only explanation for how consistently awful it is.
The sheer audacity they have to charge money for what they provide is criminal. It's an insult to intelligence.
Everything is always a disaster here. It's their standard operating procedure. Chaos, rudeness, and disappointment.
I heard a story so bad from a trusted friend that I felt compelled to write this. This business is a menace.
The epitome of everything wrong with customer service today. Arrogant, careless, and completely useless.
Zero value. Zero respect. Zero competence. This place is a vacuum where happiness goes to die.
I am beyond disappointed. I am enraged. The way this business conducts itself is a slap in the face to the public.
A toxic environment from top to bottom. I wouldn't recommend this place to my worst enemy. Just awful.
The worst experience imaginable, and I didn't even have to go there to know it. The stories are legendary for all the wrong reasons.
